detected_errors.description: More than half of the rooms/areas evident in the 2D plan segment (e.g., central hall, WC, utility room, pantry/breakfast/dining configuration) are missing or not faithfully represented in the 3D model, indicating the 3D render is not a geometrically faithful transformation of the provided plan.
Room adjacencies and proportions in the 3D render do not align with the 2D plan (kitchen/utility/WC cluster and dining/breakfast relationships appear fundamentally different).

summary: Although the second image is a true 3D cutaway, it does not correspond to the provided 2D plan layout and appears to omit/alter the majority of rooms.
